thread.title: Chance The Rapper Is Hiring An Intern
thread.title_full: Chance The Rapper Is Hiring An Intern

author: Chris DeVille
title: Chance The Rapper Is Hiring An Intern
text:
CREDIT: Christopher Polk/Getty Images 
Praise the Lord with an outburst of uncontrolled gospel jubilance because today is your lucky day. Chancellor Bennett — maybe you know him as acclaimed recording artist, civic activist, and Best New Artist honoree Chance The Rapper — tweeted this afternoon that he’s seeking an intern. Specifically, he’s looking for “someone with experience in putting together decks and writing proposals.” Chance did not specify if this will be a paid internship, but either way his mentions are already flooded with applicants, so make haste if you’re looking to get on board with the most successful independent artist in recent memory. I'm looking for an intern, someone with experience in putting together decks and writing proposals 
— Lil Chano From 79th (@chancetherapper) March 27, 2017 
By the way, I am pretty sure “putting together decks” has nothing to do with building a nice place to hang out in your backyard; apologies to all the carpentry experts out there.
